column1: Funeral services for Wanda May McFall
column6: 2015 at 4:00 p.m. at Campbell Funeral Home in Carmi with Rev. Bob McKelvey officiating. Friends may call on Saturday
column7: from 2:00 p.m. until time of service at Campbell Funeral Home.  On Monday
column9: 2015 additional services will be held at Melby Funeral Home in Platteville
column10: Wisconsin at 11:00 a.m. with visiting from 9:00 a.m. until time of service. Burial will be in Greenwood Cemetery in Platteville.
